name: Berry Balls
description: Made from simple knitted squares, these balls are given their special shape with a needle and thread after they have been put together. Any yarn and needles can be used to make balls of any size.
full_text: Made from simple knitted squares, these balls are given their special shape with a needle and thread after they have been put together. Any yarn and needles can be used to make balls of any size. All my ravelry patterns are free to download but, if you enjoy them, please consider making a donation to the British Liver Trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease. You can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here Happy Knitting!
